body.name: Small Broom with Snap-on Dust Pan, Blue Hefty Durable (1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 4 mins
features: DUSTPAN AND BRUSH SET – cleaning tools often take up a lot of unnecessary room which is why we have designed a compact solution for sweeping away crumbs, dust and life’s little oopsies. Our blue broom is a necessity to stand-by in in any kitchen cupboard so it’s on hand whenever you need to clean-up quickly

SIZE INFORMATION – made from plastic with a rubber slanted edge for easy sweeping, our mini dustpan measures 9.88 x 6.3 x 1.42 inches meaning it can be stored in small spaces such as the glove compartment of your car or a drawer in your laundry room

CONVENIENT HANGING HOLE – we have incorporated a hole into the handle design so the dustpan set can be hung from a hook or peg to keep it stored tidily. The whisk style brush clips snugly into the dustpan make it an ideal cleaning tool for RV’s and motorhomes where space can be at a premium

STIFF BRISTLE DESIGN – our brush and pan features a stiff style brush, with the brush width the same width as the pan. This means you can sweep larger piles of dirt straight into the pan without having to repeatedly sweep the same area. The handheld design means you can target many areas, even higher surfaces such as kitchen work surfaces and tables

MULTIPURPOSE NESTING DUSTPAN SET – so many customers love the versatility of our dustpan set, they use it for a manner of tasks including cleaning out pet cages, clearing up kitty litter and sweeping up dirt that their pets bring into the home. Campers love to use it to keep their tents and RV’s clean and crafters find it incredibly useful for sweeping up glitter, beads and other small items
body.description: Easy to keep clean Sometimes we forget that our cleaning tools need cleaning which is why we have made it easy for you to keep our dustpan set clean as a whistle. Just use soap and water whenever needed to leave your brush and pan set looking good and ready for the next job. Multipack options We recommend assigning a dustpan and brush set to one particular task. For example, use one set for cleaning out rabbit and guinea pig cages but use a different set for sweeping crumbs off the dining table and kitchen surfaces. We have made it affordable to do this by creating multipacks so you can save when buying more than one dustpan set. Easy and compact Large dustpan and brushes with long handles and shovel like dust collectors can be big and bulky and not always practical for smell messes and dirt piles. Using our compact nesting version is quick and easy and when finished you can put it away with zero effort. Designed to fit in a glovebox, closet, drawer or hung from a peg it is a must have for any home when a quick tidy up is required. BUY NOW and enjoy the convenience and practicality of our dustpan and brush set for your home or vehicle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little brush and dustpan seem to be well made and of good quality materials. I can’t believe how heavy they are for their size; it’s so nice that they’re not flimsy. The size is just right, as well. I’m so happy they were offered in blue. I like the stiff bristles; they’re perfect for sweeping up the kibble around my pet bowls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for your car
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I needed to keep in my car for every day messes. Small enough to fit in a large glovebox. The broom snaps into the dustpan keeping everything together in one place. This little broom & dustpan combo is perfect for your car! It’s sturdy and functional. Would recommend for this purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What I needed
reviews.reviewText: I got this to clean up after my cat. He loves to dig and dig and dig in his litter box. Gets litter everywhere! So I got this to clean it up. It does the trick. I do notice that the bristles are not the best. It is okay for litter but doesn't do well with finer material like sand and dirt. Love the small size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect small size
reviews.reviewText: I'm a delivery driver. My boots pick up all kinds of junk and gunk in thr factories and parking lots I walk on. This little set fits perfectly under the air ride driver seat of my Freightliner. Takes a couple of seconds to grab the broom, sweep whatever junk my boots get on the truck's floor into the little dust pan and toss it into my trash can. Thr bristles are about perfect, not too stiff nor too soft. Moves the tough stuff easily into the pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stiff, small, great
reviews.reviewText: This is stiff enough to get the stuff out of our camper van carpet really well. I was worried it would be 'cheap', but it seems sturdy. It's small enough to keep it tucked in the door of the van and battle the preschool lunch-in-the-van crumbs. And there are many.
